nodes.text: Sigma Station was a terrestrial location where an incident occurred involving the rebel trooper Pol Andrissus, a member of the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry, while he was on temporary leave sometime by the year 3 ABY. Following the death of Andrissus in 3 ABY, members of his battle group told stories about him after his funeral, including the incident on Sigma Station.
Sigma Station was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
